abstracts.cdata!:
The Eligibility Report for the Coal
            Sector Environmental and Social Mitigation Project and Coal
            Sector Rehabilitation Project in India responds to claims
            made by the Requestors that they have suffered harm as a
            result of failures and omissions of IDA, including the
            failure to provide income restoration. The Requestors feel
            that without compensatory land, employment or
            self-employment they subsist as casual laborers at mere
            survival levels with the loss of human dignity and the
            demoralization at being dependent on the coal company that
            does not employ them. For the purpose of determining
            eligibility, the Panel reviewed the Request and the
            Management Response to the Request. Panel members also
            visited the sites in question to better determine the
            eligibility. The Requestors were found eligible and the
            Panel recommends that an Investigation take place.
